name: Chester
description: Chester makes vicious fun of anyone in sight, trying to get under their skin. The more hate he gets, the better... especially if that hater is Mandy!

gadgets.name: Spicy Dice
gadgets.description: Chester gets a new random Super that is different from his current one.

gadgets.name: Candy Beans
gadgets.description: Chester eats a mystery flavored candy bean from his cap, gaining a random buff for 5 seconds.

starpowers.name: Bell 'O' Mania
starpowers.description: Chester's attack has an extra stage with four bells.

starpowers.name: Sneak Peek
starpowers.description: Chester will always know what his next Super will be.

tips: If you forget how many bells Chester's next attack will fire, look at the attack spread.
Consider getting close to enemies when using his 3/4 bells attack. If you have difficulty approaching, try using his Candy Beans Gadget or his Jawbreaker Super.
Chester can deal with higher health enemies easier with the extra stage given by his Bell 'O' Mania Star Power.

Even though enemies might know what Super you have, his Candy Popper Super is effective at distancing enemies near your spawn, while not pushing them too far back to hit only one bell from Chester's attack.

At the start of the game, if you have the Bell 'O' Mania Star Power equipped, shoot one bell so that Chester will have his second, third, and fourth bell waiting. With Chester's next bells, you will be able to kill most Brawlers.
He is a very viable option in Knockout, very versatile and can come back from a 1v3 situation with his Supers.
The best setup for Chester is the Candy Beans Gadget and his Bell 'O' Mania Star Power, and it's recommended to have the Extra Gadget and Shield Gears equipped.
He is also a very good last pick in Power League if you are unsure of how to combat the synergy of the enemy team.

history.description: Chester and his Dark skin were added to the game.
Fixed an issue where Chester's Pop Rocks Super didn't spawn after activating it when he was defeated.
Chester's Candy Beans Gadget and Sneak Peek Star Power were added.
Chester's main attack damage was decreased to 640 (from 720).
The number of hits necessary to charge Chester's Super was increased to 7 hits (from 6).
Chester's Jawbreaker Super damage was decreased to 200 (from 1400).
Chester's Jawbreaker Super recharge rate was decreased by 66%.
Chester's Jawbreaker Super projectile speed was decreased by 25%.
Chester's Jawbreaker Super stun duration was decreased to 1 second (from 2).
Chester's True Silver and True Gold skins were added.
The Wood Spirit Chester skin was added. It was featured as an Enchanted Woods skin.
All Brawlers' health and damage were increased from 5% to 10% with each Power Level.
Fixed an issue with the Wood Spirit Chester skin having extra abilities.
Fixed an issue with Chester's Super after respawning.
Fixed an issue with Chester's Bell 'O' Mania Star Power not receiving damage buffs.

Chester's flavor text was changed from "What's in the box? Limitation of Liability: Under no circumstances shall Starr Corporation or its affiliates, partners, suppliers or licensors be liable for any indirect, incidental, ..." to "Chester makes vicious fun of anyone in sight, trying to get under their skin. The more hate he gets, the better... especially if that hater is Mandy!"

attack.name: Cap and Bells
attack.description: Chester shoots a sequence of bells from his cap, first one, then two and lastly three bells.
